message: Local variable name 'aBtnOp' must match pattern '^[a-z]([a-z0-9][a-zA-Z0-9]*)?$'.
Local variable name 'aBtnNum' must match pattern '^[a-z]([a-z0-9][a-zA-Z0-9]*)?$'.
Local variable name 'aBtnOp' must match pattern '^[a-z]([a-z0-9][a-zA-Z0-9]*)?$'.
'}' at column 7 should be on the same line as the next part of a multi-block statement (one that directly contains multiple blocks: if/else-if/else, do/while or try/catch/finally).
Abbreviation in name 'CEActionListener' must contain no more than '2' consecutive capital letters.
